title: Add doc for CopyDebugSymbolFilesFromPackages and CopyDocumentationFilesFromPackages properties
body:
Related to a new feature (consuming pdbs/documents from packages), which was brought in in .NET 7.
PR from sdk: https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/pull/27580

Document the `CopyDebugSymbolFilesFromPackages`  and `CopyDocumentationFilesFromPackages` properties.

nodes.body:
Thanks for reviewing @JanKrivanek!
Seems I'm not authorized to merge this PR.. Could you help merge this PR? Thanks!
Or, is there anything else blocking the merging? :)
